name: Cute Island - GAME3023-F2022-TermProject
description:
How to play:  

  WASD to move, save button to save the game, 

click  to choose main monster.

  If step into the sand / Tall grass the monster will show up

  Choose the ability to use and after defeating the monsters you can own it.
